TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit NameObjectCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class NameObjectCollectionBase Implements ICollection, IDeserializationCallback, ISerializable
public ref class NameObjectCollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 提供 基底類別給可以用索引鍵或索引來存取之相關聯的 索引鍵和 值集合。

span.span: Provides the base class for a collection of associated keys and values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的基礎結構是雜湊表。The underlying structure for this class is a hash table. 每個項目是索引鍵/值組。Each element is a key/value pair. 容量是項目數目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 雜湊碼提供者在該雜湊程式碼中的索引鍵執行個體。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 預設雜湊碼提供者是。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子會是。The default comparer is the . 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，這個類別會使用區分文化特性的字串比較。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 不過，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更新版本中，這個類別會使用比較字串時。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 如需文化特性如何影響比較和排序的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行不區分文化特性的字串作業](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). `null` 允許做為索引鍵或值。`null` is allowed as a key or as a value. > [!CAUTION] > 方法不會區分`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`因為索引鍵相關聯的值是傳回哪個`null`。The method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作及使用類別。The following code example shows how to implement and use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/nameobjectcollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/nameobjectcollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/nameobjectcollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但在衍生的類別可以建立自己的同步的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白的。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 雜湊碼提供者在該雜湊程式碼中的索引鍵執行個體。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 預設雜湊碼提供者是。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子會是。The default comparer is the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IEqualityComparer equalityComparer) cil managed

param.name: equalityComparer
param.span: 物件，可用來判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等，以及為集合中的索引鍵產生雜湊碼。

span.span: The object to use to determine whether two keys are equal and to generate hash codes for the keys in the collection.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體是空白的、具有預設的初始容量，並使用指定的 物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that is empty, has the default initial capacity, and uses the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量物件則是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a object is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 物件結合的比較子和雜湊碼提供者。The object combines the comparer and the hash code provider. 雜湊碼提供者在該雜湊程式碼中的索引鍵。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 雜湊碼提供者在該雜湊程式碼中的索引鍵執行個體。The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the instance. 預設雜湊碼提供者是。The default hash code provider is the . 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。The comparer determines whether two keys are equal. 預設比較子會是。The default comparer is the . 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量，容量增加的自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前現有的項目複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比容量，這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加，以容納新項目容量，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用來建立新的的項目和。The following code example uses to create a new with elements from an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合包含具有指定索引鍵的多個項目，這個方法會傳回第一個項目。If the collection contains multiple entries with the specified key, this method returns only the first entry. 若要取得的後續項目的值使用相同的金鑰，可使用的列舉值逐一查看集合，並比較索引鍵。To get the values of subsequent entries with the same key, use the enumerator to iterate through the collection and compare the keys. > [!CAUTION] > 這個方法會傳回`null`在下列情況： 1) 如果找不到指定的索引鍵。和 2） 如果找到指定的索引鍵，其相關聯的值為`null`。This method returns `null` in the following cases: 1) if the specified key is not found; and 2) if the specified key is found and its associated value is `null`. 這個方法不會區分兩種情況。This method does not distinguish between the two cases. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和取得特定索引鍵和值。The following code example uses and to get specific keys and values. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/CPP/nocb_baseget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/CS/nocb_baseget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet/VB/nocb_baseget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵項目維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用和移除項目從。The following code example uses and to remove elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CPP/nocb_baseremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/CS/nocb_baseremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseRemove/VB/nocb_baseremove.vb#1)]

span.span: The number of key/value pairs contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量則是項目數目，可以儲存。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 大於或等於容量是一律。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過容量加入項目時，複製的舊項目並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部的陣列，就會自動增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator

summary.span: 傳回在 中逐一查看的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉值傳回為字串集合的索引鍵。This enumerator returns the keys of the collection as strings. C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示 執行個體是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the instance is read-only.

value.span: 如果 執行個體是唯讀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the instance is read-only; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立唯讀的集合。The following code example creates a read-only collection. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CPP/nocb_isreadonly.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/CS/nocb_isreadonly.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.IsReadOnly/VB/nocb_isreadonly.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然方法看不到 COM 用戶端，根據預設，繼承類別將它公開和 COM 用戶端會造成非預期的行為。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的陣列必須是相容的類型。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 這個方法會使用複製項目。This method uses to copy the elements. 雖然方法看不到 COM 用戶端，根據預設，繼承類別將它公開和 COM 用戶端會造成非預期的行為。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，表示是否要同步處理 (執行緒安全) 對 物件的存取。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果要同步處理 (執行緒安全) 對 物件的存取，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件未同步處理。A object is not synchronized. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程的屬性。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 取得可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: 可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本類別使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業屬性物件，直接依據物件。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
